channel.title: How to make firecape move?
channel.description: My firecape doesn't move atm, I have a scarce idea on how to make it work, but I need some help. Could anyone please help me? Tips would help :D

item.title: How to make firecape move?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

I did make my water move, but I don’t have an idea of how I would do it for a fire cape.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make firecape move?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:2, topic:318110”]hmmm
i believe
that
when you do something involving moving water
you can do something involving moving lava
seeming the lava has the same texture as your cape.
DUN DUN DUN DUN!!!111[/quote]

that won’t work, if you actually look at where you do moving textures and shit with water, there is nothing about lava.
although you can make things lava.

Read full topic
